Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Teens
Status: New Series
Network: ABC Family ( USA)
Runtime: 2 Minutes
Premiere: August 28, 2012
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32863)

Pretty Dirty Secrets are webisodes of Pretty Little Liars.
Pretty Dirty Secrets is web series that airs every Tuesday on ABCFamily.com as a way to tide viewers over until the Halloween special. The webisodes started airing after the summer finale (August 28th) and will continue to air until the Halloween episode. The series takes place in Rosewood's Halloween store as the residents of Rosewood get ready for Halloween. Brant Daugherty (Noel Kahn), Yani Gellman (Garrett Reynolds), Vanessa Ray (CeCe Drake), Brendan Robinson (Lucas Gottesman) and Drew Van Acker (Jason DiLaurentis) all star in the web series as their Pretty Little Liars characters with Aeriel Miranda as the character of 'Shana' and Salem Avenion as the character of 'Donnie' are being introduced to the franchise.
(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pretty_Little_Liars_(season_3)#Pretty_Dirty_Secrets)
